text: Phlegmariurus compactus is a species of plant in the family Lycopodiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador, where it is distributed throughout the southern Andean páramos. It occurs up to 4500 meters in altitude.Navarrete, H. & Pitman, N. 2003. Huperzia compacta. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2. Downloaded on 31 August 2015. ==References== compactus Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Phlegmariurus compactus
